items.sentence: I hope that Tom has finally found what he was looking for.
I wanted to practice speaking French with native speakers.
It seemed like every woman on the bus was wearing perfume.
Tom got angry because I didn\'t do what he asked me to do.
You\'re supposed to be helping Tom right now, aren\'t you?
You\'re supposed to be here tomorrow at 2:30, aren\'t you?
You\'re the one who convinced Tom to do that, aren\'t you?
I wonder why Tom didn\'t tell you about what had happened.
Tom suggested that we should all go to the beach tomorrow.
Tom thought Mary was the one who had told John to do that.
